title: Limits the number of intact animals over the age of four months a person or business can own, possess, control or otherwise have charge or custody of
summary: Provides that no person or business who buys, sells or offers for sale dogs or cats to the public or at wholesale shall possess or own more than 50 dogs or cats with intact sexual organs over the age of four months.

       AN  ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to a limit
         on the number of intact animals over the age of four months  a  person
         or  business  can  own,  possess,  control or otherwise have charge or
         custody

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The agriculture and markets law is amended by adding a new
    2  section 380 to read as follows:
    3    S 380. LIMIT ON INTACT ANIMALS. NO PERSON OR BUSINESS BUYING, SELLING,
    4  OR OFFERING FOR SALE DOGS OR CATS TO THE PUBLIC OR  AT  WHOLESALE  SHALL
    5  OWN,  POSSESS,  CONTROL OR OTHERWISE HAVE CHARGE OR CUSTODY OF MORE THAN
    6  FIFTY DOGS OVER THE AGE OF FOUR MONTHS AND CATS OVER  THE  AGE  OF  FOUR
    7  MONTHS  WITH INTACT SEXUAL ORGANS KEPT FOR THE PURPOSE OF BREEDING THOSE
    8  ANIMALS AND SELLING THEIR OFFSPRING AS A COMPANION ANIMAL.  A  VIOLATION
    9  OF  THIS SECTION IS A CLASS A MISDEMEANOR. NOTHING IN THIS SECTION SHALL
   10  BE CONSTRUED TO AFFECT ANY PROTECTIONS AFFORDED TO DOGS, CATS, OR  OTHER
   11  ANIMALS UNDER ANY OTHER PROVISIONS OF THIS ARTICLE.
   12    S  2.  Section  373  of  the agriculture and markets law is amended by
   13  adding a new subdivision 2-a to read as follows:
   14    2-A. ANY SUCH AGENT OR OFFICER MAY ALSO LAWFULLY  TAKE  POSSESSION  OF
   15  ANY  ANIMALS  KEPT  IN VIOLATION OF SECTION THREE HUNDRED EIGHTY OF THIS
   16  ARTICLE AND THE OFFSPRING OF SUCH ANIMALS,  PROVIDED  THAT  A  COMPLAINT
   17  STATING JUST AND REASONABLE GROUNDS IS MADE UNDER OATH OR AFFIRMATION TO
   18  ANY  MAGISTRATE AUTHORIZED TO ISSUE WARRANTS IN CRIMINAL CASES, AND THAT
   19  SUCH WARRANT AUTHORIZING ENTRY AND SEARCH IS  ISSUED  AND  DELIVERED  BY
